entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
